mapper.select: select su.id, su.dept_id deptId, d.name deptName, su.role_id roleId, r.name roleName, sui.avatar avatar, su.nickname nickname, su.account account, su.mailbox mailbox, sui.qq qq, sui.phone phone, su.create_by createBy, su.create_time createTime, su.modify_by modifyBy, su.modify_time modifyTime from sys_user su join sys_user_info sui on sui.user_id = su.id left join sys_dept d on su.dept_id = d.id left join `sys_role` r on su.role_id = r.id where su.effective = 1
